name: firm
trans: a company or business

name: epicenter
trans: the central point of something

name: point
trans: to direct other people’s attention to something by signaling toward it with your finger

name: branch
trans: A branch is one of the offices or groups that form part of a large business organization

name: shift
trans: the time period during which you are at work

name: wealthy
trans: rich

name: routinely
trans: used for describing what often or usually happens

name: decisive
trans: making choices quickly and surely, without having any doubts

name: preponderance
trans: the largest part or greatest amount

name: remainder
trans: the part that is left after the other parts are gone, used, or taken away

name: confront
trans: to deal with a difficult problem, situation, or person

name: looming
trans: (of something unwanted or unpleasant) about to happen soon and causing worry

name: controversy
trans: a disagreement, often a public one, that involves different ideas or opinions about something

name: opponent
trans: a person who disagrees with something and speaks against it or tries to change it

name: proponent
trans: a person who supports an idea, plan, or cause

name: boon
trans: something good or very helpful

name: turnover
trans: the rate at which employees leave a company and are replaced

name: coincide
trans: to come together in position or happen at or near the same time

name: catch up
trans: to reach the same quality or standard as someone or something else

name: enticing
trans: Something that is enticing attracts you to it by offering you advantages or pleasure
